title: Indoor Navigator
description: HackOHI/O 2025 multi-environment campus navigation system with indoor positioning, outdoor pathfinding, and garage routing. Features classroom schedules for all buildings, ADA-compliant routing, and sensor fusion for real-time tracking without WiFi infrastructure.
techUsed: JavaScript, HTML5 Canvas, PWA, Sensor Fusion, Python, Flask

title: RepoRover
description: AI-powered repository intelligence platform leveraging RAG architecture with vector embeddings for semantic code search. Enables natural language queries over codebases using LangChain and OpenAI models.
techUsed: Python, Flask, LangChain, OpenAI API, Elasticsearch, Next.js

title: Attendance Processor
description: Production data pipeline automating attendance reporting for Greater Ohio Virtual School. Processes complex CSV transformations with Pandas, reducing manual work from hours to seconds.

title: Legends of Zelda
description: NES-inspired 2D game engine built from scratch with custom collision detection, sprite animation system, and state-based enemy AI. Implements design patterns for maintainable game architecture.

title: Alumni Social Platform
description: Award-winning full-stack social network (J.P. Morgan Chase Code for Good). Built scalable REST API with JWT authentication, real-time messaging, and profile matching algorithms for LMCC alumni community.

title: Weather App
description: Location-aware weather dashboard with geolocation integration and dynamic search. Features responsive design and real-time API data fetching with error handling and loading states.
techUsed: OpenWeatherMap API, GitHub Pages, HTML, CSS

title: Brutus the Plumber
description: Low-level game implementation in C featuring real-time physics engine, custom collision detection algorithms, and memory-efficient data structures. Console-rendered graphics with optimized frame updates.

title: Tech Learning Platform
description: EdTech platform with adaptive learning paths and real-time progress analytics. Implements Firebase authentication, Firestore database with complex queries, and component-based React architecture for scalability.

title: Money Tracker
description: Full-stack financial dashboard with secure user authentication, CRUD operations for transactions, and data visualization. Features REST API design and MongoDB aggregation pipelines for spending insights.
